001package com.technototes.vision.subsystem;
002
003import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraRotation;
004
005import com.technototes.library.subsystem.Subsystem;
006import com.technototes.vision.hardware.Camera;
007
008/**
009 * A vision streaming pipeline to enable vision processing during an opmode
010 */
011@SuppressWarnings("unused")
012public class PipelineSubsystem implements Subsystem {
013
014    /**
015     * The Camera object this subsystem is processing frames from
016     */
017    protected Camera camera;
018
019    /**
020     * Create the subsystem with the Camera provided
021     *
022     * @param c The camera to process frames from
023     */
024    public PipelineSubsystem(Camera c) {
025        camera = c;
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Get the Camera device that frames are being processed from
030     *
031     * @return the Camera device in use
032     */
033    public Camera getDevice() {
034        return camera;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * This begins streaming frames from the camera
039     *
040     * @param width  The width of the frame (constrained to a specific range, based on the camera device)
041     * @param height The height of the frame (constrained based on the camera device)
042     * @return this PipelineSubsystem (for chaining, I guess?)
043     */
044    public PipelineSubsystem startStreaming(int width, int height) {
045        camera.startStreaming(width, height);
046        return this;
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * This begins streaming frames from the camera
051     *
052     * @param width    The width of the frame (constrained to a specific range, based on the camera device)
053     * @param height   The height of the frame (consrained based on the camera device)
054     * @param rotation The rotation of the frame to acquire
055     * @return this PipelineSubsystem (for chaining, I guess?)
056     */
057    public PipelineSubsystem startStreaming(int width, int height, OpenCvCameraRotation rotation) {
058        camera.startStreaming(width, height, rotation);
059        return this;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Stop frame processing
064     *
065     * @return this PipelineSubsystem (for chaining)
066     */
067    public PipelineSubsystem stopStreaming() {
068        camera.stopStreaming();
069        return this;
070    }
071}
